      void AcrossModule.setExposeFilter(BeanFilter exposeFilter)
      Sets the filter that will be used after module bootstrap to copy beans to the parent context and make them available to other modules in the AcrossContext.

    • Uses of BeanFilter in com.foreach.across.core.filters

      Classes in com.foreach.across.core.filters that implement BeanFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractClassBasedBeanFilter<T> 
      class  AnnotatedMethodFilter
      Filter that searches for beans having a method with the specific annotation.
      class  AnnotationBeanFilter
      Beans or definitions with any of the given annotations will be copied.
      class  BeanFilterComposite
      Holds any number of BeanFilter implementations and will delegate calls to all of them.
      class  ClassBeanFilter
      Filters on any number of specific classes.
      class  NamedBeanFilter
      Filters beans on a set of allowed bean names.
      class  PackageBeanFilter
      Applies to all classes that are in one of the given packages.
      Methods in com.foreach.across.core.filters that return BeanFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BeanFilter BeanFilter.annotations(Class<?>... classes)
      Creates an AnnotationBeanFilter for the given classes.
      static BeanFilter BeanFilter.beanNames(String... beanNames)
      Creates a NamedBeanFilter for the given bean names.
      static BeanFilter BeanFilter.classNames(String... classNames)
      Creates a BeanFilterComposite for the given class names: if a class is present on the classpath and is not an annotation, it will be checked for instance.
      static BeanFilter BeanFilter.composite(BeanFilter... beanFilters)
      Creates a BeanFilterComposite for a given array of filters.
      static BeanFilter BeanFilter.empty() 
      static BeanFilter BeanFilter.instances(Class<?>... classes)
      Creates a ClassBeanFilter for the given classes.
      static BeanFilter BeanFilter.packages(Class<?>... packageClasses)
      Creates a PackageBeanFilter for the given package names.
      static BeanFilter BeanFilter.packages(String... packageNames)
      Creates a PackageBeanFilter for the given package names.
